title: Authorities Dismantle Large-Scale Credit Card Fraud Scheme Affecting 4.3 Million Users

content.raw: Authorities across nine countries executed a coordinated crackdown on one of the largest credit card fraud networks ever dismantled. Operation Chargeback, led by German prosecutors and the Bundeskriminalamt, brought down criminal organizations responsible for defrauding over 4.3 million cardholders globally.
